search_results.title: Laura Balser
search_results.snippet: Laura Balser is a Senior Client Partner in Executive Pay & Governance for Korn Ferry working closely with management and boards.

search_results.title: Meet Laura Balser, Goizueta Advisory Board Chair
search_results.snippet: Laura Balser 94BBA 01MBA, who began her term as Goizueta Advisory Board Chair on September 1, 2023.
